item.title: Imaging and complex-structured data applications
item.description: We are developing statistical models to (i) identify associations between complex-structured data (imaging, spatial-genomic, geospatial, digital) from multi-platform data sources, (ii) predict clinical characteristics of interest by integrating biomarkers generated from complex-structured data, and (iii) understand the biological relevance and implications of our findings. Our methods are developed in the context of various diseases such as cancer and neurodegenerative (Alzheimer’s) diseases.
